name: Stonewall Penitentiary
description: 7 Suspects. 1 Killer. Stonewall Penitentiary is an indie murder mystery adventure that is presented in the visual style of graphic novels. Discover why you and six others were kidnapped by an unknown captor as you search an eerie prison and solve mind-bending puzzles to determine "whodunit"!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP or later Processor: Pentium 4 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: any Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: optional but highly recommended Additional Notes: Native resolution: 1366x768; rescales to fill screen
